task.title: Step 3. Update the Environment Configuration File
task.shortdesc: Each RPM installation uses the same default values as the previous version for all of the directory environment variables. If the previous version used the default values, the new version is configured to use the same working directories.

context.p: If the previous version used customized values for the directory environment variables, you must make the same customizations in the new version. The new version must use the same data, log, and resource directories as the previous version.

step.cmd: In the new version of , open the $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdcd-env.sh file.
Manually update the new environment configuration file with any customized property values that you defined in the previous version.
